name: Baby games for 2 -4 year olds·
description:
Kiddoland is a comprehensive early learning program packed with fun educational games that children adore. Learn ABCs, shapes, numbers, colors, and more. Great for children 1 to 5 years old!

==== Over 40,000,000 kids love learning and playing with 22learn apps! ====
==== Fascinating early learning adventure. ====
==== Perfect for babies, toddles, and preschoolers. ====
==== Members gain access to regular monthly updates and new games. ====

Packed with tons of engaging content that encourages learning, exploration, and play, Kiddoland is your one stop for making screen time a learning time. Children who enter Kiddoland are welcomed with an array of adventures that they independently choose. To play, children can assemble truck puzzles, play with animals, or build a farm using stickers. To learn, they can learn letter names, shapes, colors, first words, or tracing. Let your children play with Kiddoland and be assured that their mind is engaged.

Funny characters, stunning visuals, quirky animations, and gentle encouragement keep young children constantly motivated as they gradually build their skills and confidence.

==== Learn. Play. Explore. ====

Learn: ABCs, shapes, colors, numbers, and much more!
Play: Build trucks, play with animals, complete puzzles.
Create & explore: Build a farm, interact with fun characters.

==== Educational and fun activities that boost children’s development. ====

Foundational preschool learning areas nourish children’s competence:
* Uppercase Letters
* Lowercase Letters
* Numbers
* Shapes
* Colors
* First Words
* Tracing Letters
* Tracing Numbers

Cornucopia of children’s favorite games:
* Logical and Shape Puzzles
* Connect the Dots
* Coloring
* Feed and Groom Animals
* Sort Fruit
* Memory Game
* Build Your Own Farm with Stickers

==== Features ====

+ Educational and fun mini-games for children
+ Professional animations, voice-over, and sound effects
+ Colorful child-friendly design
+ Developed in cooperation with experienced teachers and parents
+ Play all pre-downloaded games offline
+ No third-party ads or links to social media
+ Regular monthly updates

Fun games and educational activities are waiting. Time to learn! Prepare your child for success with this comprehensive early learning program by 22learn!
